statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider='ABC Insurance'
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE billing_code='123'
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_provider FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT MIN(claim_amount) FROM healthcare_billing
SELECT patient_id, SUM(claim_amount) FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT insurance_provider, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY insurance_provider
SELECT insurance_provider, AVG(claim_amount) FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY insurance_provider
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM healthcare_billing ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, billing_code FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT patient_id, insurance_provider, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider IN ('ABC Insurance', 'XYZ Insurance')
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_date FROM healthcare_billing LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount, treatment_date FROM healthcare_billing WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE billing_code IN ('ABC123', 'DEF456');
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY patient_name, insurance_provider;
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_provider FROM healthcare_billing;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount, treatment_date FROM healthcare_billing ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider LIKE 'A%';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount, treatment_date FROM healthcare_billing WHERE YEAR(treatment_date) = 2021;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM healthcare_billing;
SELECT insurance_provider, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY insurance_provider;
SELECT DISTINCT billing_code FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider = 'UnitedHealth';
SELECT insurance_provider, AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE treatment_date > '2022-06-01' GROUP BY insurance_provider;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE insurance_provider = 'Cigna' AND billing_code LIKE '%XYZ%';
SELECT insurance_provider, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM healthcare_billing GROUP BY insurance_provider;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, claim_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM health_services;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM health_services;
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_description FROM health_services;
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM health_services;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT DISTINCT claim_status FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services LEFT JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services RIGHT JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services FULL JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM health_services;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT service_name, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id GROUP BY service_name;
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS claim_count FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id GROUP BY service_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services WHERE service_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000);
SELECT * FROM health_services WHERE service_name = 'Dentistry';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM health_services WHERE service_id = 5;
SELECT insurance_claims.claim_amount, insurance_claims.claim_status FROM insurance_claims INNER JOIN health_services ON insurance_claims.patient_id = health_services.service_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;

SELECT service_id, service_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM health_services INNER JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id GROUP BY service_id, service_name;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM health_services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status IN ('Approved', 'Denied');
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_description FROM health_services WHERE service_description LIKE '%consultation%';
SELECT patient_id, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT(service_name) FROM health_services;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT service_id, service_name, claim_amount FROM health_services JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id WHERE claim_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM health_services LEFT JOIN insurance_claims ON health_services.service_id = insurance_claims.patient_id;
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE patient_id = (SELECT service_id FROM health_services WHERE service_name = 'Surgery');
SELECT SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims;
SELECT * FROM insurance;
SELECT insurance_id, insurance_name FROM insurance;
SELECT insurance_name, insurance_contact FROM insurance;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_name FROM patients JOIN insurance ON patients.patient_id = insurance.insurance_id;
SELECT patient_name, claim_date FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_address FROM patients JOIN insurance ON patients.patient_id = insurance.insurance_id;
SELECT claim_id, insurance_name FROM claims JOIN insurance ON claims.insurance_id = insurance.insurance_id;
SELECT claim_id, patient_name FROM claims JOIN patients ON claims.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT insurance_name, claim_amount FROM insurance JOIN claims ON insurance.insurance_id = claims.insurance_id;
SELECT insurance_name, insurance_type FROM insurance;
SELECT patient_name, claim_status FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT insurance_name, insurance_contact FROM insurance WHERE insurance_type = 'Health';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_name FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id JOIN insurance ON insurance.insurance_id = claims.claim_id;
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claims.claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT patient_name, claim_date FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claims.claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claims.claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT insurance_name, insurance_type FROM insurance WHERE insurance_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_name FROM patients JOIN insurance ON patients.patient_id = insurance.insurance_id;
SELECT patient_name, claim_status FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id WHERE claims.claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_type FROM patients JOIN insurance ON patients.patient_id = insurance.insurance_id WHERE insurance.insurance_type = 'Health';
SELECT patient_name, claim_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_name, count(*) FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(claim_amount) AS average_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_amount FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;

SELECT patient_name, insurance_name, count(*) FROM patients JOIN claims ON patients.patient_id = claims.patient_id JOIN insurance ON insurance.insurance_id = claims.claim_id GROUP BY patient_name, insurance_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients
SELECT * FROM Services
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM Services
SELECT * FROM Claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims
SELECT * FROM Payments
SELECT claim_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payments

SELECT patient_name, service_name, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT patient_name, service_name, claim_date, payment_date, claim_amount, payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, pymt.payment_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_date, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT patient_name, service_name, claim_date, claim_amount, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_date, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_date, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT patient_name, service_name, claim_date, claim_amount, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_date, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT p.patient_name, s.service_name, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, pymt.payment_date, pymt.payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id

SELECT patient_name, service_name, claim_date, claim_amount, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Patients p JOIN Claims c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Services s ON c.service_id = s.service_id JOIN Payments pymt ON c.claim_id = pymt.claim_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Services.service_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Services ON Claims.service_id = Services.service_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_date, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.claim_amount > 1000;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount, Payments.payment_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id WHERE Payments.payment_amount > Claims.claim_amount;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_date, Payments.payment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id ORDER BY Claims.claim_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Services.service_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Services ON Claims.service_id = Services.service_id WHERE Patients.date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Services.service_name, Claims.claim_date, Payments.payment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Services ON Claims.service_id = Services.service_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id WHERE Patients.insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name HAVING SUM(Claims.claim_amount) > 5000;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount, Payments.payment_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id WHERE Payments.payment_method = 'Credit Card';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_date, Payments.payment_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id WHERE Patients.patient_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Services.service_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Services ON Claims.service_id = Services.service_id WHERE Claims.claim_amount IN (SELECT MAX(claim_amount) FROM Claims);

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.service_id IN (SELECT service_id FROM Services WHERE service_cost > 500);
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.claim_date = (SELECT MAX(claim_date) FROM Claims);
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.claim_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_claims FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name ORDER BY num_claims DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, AVG(Claims.claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount, SUM(Payments.payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_amount, Payments.payment_method FROM Patients INNER JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id WHERE Claims.claim_amount > Payments.payment_amount ORDER BY Claims.claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT patient_name FROM patients WHERE insurance_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM bills GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT company_name, address FROM insurance_companies WHERE insurance_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, bill_id, status FROM claims WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT hospitals.hospital_name, patients.patient_name FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT bills.bill_id, bills.amount, claims.status FROM bills JOIN claims ON bills.bill_id = claims.bill_id;

SELECT hospital_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE insurance_id IN (SELECT insurance_id FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_name = 'Company A');
SELECT hospital_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_companies WHERE insurance_id NOT IN (SELECT insurance_id FROM patients);
SELECT company_name, COUNT(insurance_id) AS num_patients FROM insurance_companies JOIN patients ON insurance_companies.insurance_id = patients.insurance_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE insurance_id IN (SELECT insurance_id FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Insurance');
SELECT patient_name, amount FROM patients JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id WHERE patients.patient_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, address FROM insurance_companies WHERE insurance_id IN (SELECT insurance_id FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1);
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claims WHERE bill_id IN (SELECT bill_id FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000);
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals WHERE hospital_id IN (SELECT hospital_id FROM patients JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id WHERE amount > 500);
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE date_issued BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, company_name FROM patients JOIN insurance_companies ON patients.insurance_id = insurance_id;

SELECT hospital_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM hospitals JOIN patients JOIN bills ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id AND patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name, patient_id FROM hospitals LEFT JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id;

SELECT company_name, COUNT(insurance_id) AS num_patients FROM insurance_companies JOIN patients ON insurance_companies.insurance_id = patients.insurance_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING num_patients > 10;

SELECT hospital_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM hospitals JOIN patients JOIN bills ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id AND patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claims WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY date_processed ASC;
SELECT hospital_name, location, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name, location;
SELECT patient_name, amount, date_issued FROM patients JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id ORDER BY date_issued DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT hospital_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM hospitals JOIN patients JOIN bills ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id AND patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name HAVING avg_amount > 2000;

SELECT hospital_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM hospitals JOIN patients JOIN bills ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id AND patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT hospital_name, location, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM hospitals JOIN patients ON hospitals.hospital_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY hospital_name, location ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
SELECT patient_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM patients JOIN bills ON patients.patient_id = bills.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING total_amount > 1000;
